metadata.title: Live Poultry Exposure and Public Response to Influenza A(H7N9) in Urban and Rural China during Two Epidemic Waves in 2013-2014

abstract.original_text: The novel influenza A(H7N9) virus has caused 2013 spring and 2013-2014 winter waves of human infections since its first emergence in China in March 2013. Exposure to live poultry is a risk factor for H7N9 infection. Public psychobehavioral responses often change during progression of an epidemic.

sentences.segment_text: The novel influenza A ( H7N9 ) virus has caused 2013 spring and 2013-2014 winter waves of human infections since its first emergence in China in March 2013 .
Exposure to live poultry is a risk factor for H7N9 infection .
Public psychobehavioral responses often change during progression of an epidemic .
